version_description:
- New game mode: 60 Second Challenge! The game only ends when your time is up. Can you beat the moon before the countdown hits zero?
- Costumes! Six moon costumes to unlock. :)
- End sequence when you beat the moon is now skippable.
- Support for
This is a quick fix for a bug introduced in the previous update that sometimes caused the app to become unresponsive after clicking on a banner ad. Sorry about that!

- Two new costumes! Both are unlocked and ready to go!
- Performance improvements, including 64-bit support.
- Fixed a rare issue that sometimes prevented sound from playing.
- Reduced the frequency of the full-screen ads a little. :)

- Pl
This is just a small update to fix an issue with saving scores when running the game under the beta version of iOS 9. Thanks for playing!

Six new costumes!

- If you previously paid to remove ads and unlock all costumes, all new ones will be automatically unlocked. :D
- Otherwise, you can now earn coins to get costumes. This makes it easier to unlock them in any order. Coins are ea

This is a small update to fix a couple of bugs, but I also added two more costumes just for fun. :]

- New! WIGGY MOON and MONKEY KING costumes.
- Fixed bug with random costume selector sometimes not working properly when all costumes unlocked.
Hello! This is just a tiny future-proofing maintenance update. Not very exciting, perhaps, but it is my solemn duty to submit maintenance updates when the need arises, and that need is now! - Shaun.

This is a minor update that fixes the following bugs:
- A cheeky bug that could allow ads to still show after purchasing the Unlock All Costumes IAP.
- A tiny bug that sometimes prevented saved data being loaded from iCloud.
- A surprisingly stub

This is a small update to keep things running smoothly.
I also added four new costumes: Koala, Bumblebee, Party Moon, and Cactus!
Thanks for playing! - Shaun :]

This is a minor update that fixes the following bugs:

- A tiny bug that sometimes prevented saved data being loaded from iCloud.
